exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type f : A -> nat l : list (btree A) H : l <> nil Unable to unify "exists t : btree ?M1514, cover ?M1515 t" with "exists t : btree A, cover_min l t".

chat.content:
A: Type
f: A -> nat
============================
forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover_min l t

Related definitions and lemmas:
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
cover_min = fun (l : list (btree A)) (t1 : btree A) => cover l t1 /\ (forall t2 : btree A, cover l t2 -> weight_tree f t1 <= weight_tree f t2) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop Arguments cover_min _%list_scope
one_cover_ex : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover l t
cover_not_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> nil
cover_min_permutation : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover_min l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover_min l2 t
all_cover_aux_cover : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> In t (all_cover_aux A l n) -> cover l t
cover_all_cover_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> cover l t -> In t (all_cover_aux A l n)
all_cover_cover : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), In t (all_cover A l) -> cover l t
cover_all_cover : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> In t (all_cover A l)
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
cover_min_one : forall t : btree A, cover_min (t :: nil) t
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> nil -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
in_ex_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2
app_removelast_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), l <> nil -> l = removelast l ++ last l d :: nil
hd_error_some_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (a : A), hd_error l = Some a -> l <> nil
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
cover_in_inb : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t2 t1
list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
inb_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
inb_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
cover_number_of_nodes : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> number_of_nodes t = fold_left (fun (x : nat) (y : btree A) => x + number_of_nodes y) l 0 + Init.Nat.pred (length l)
map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = nil -> l = nil
cover_inv_leaf : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (leaf a) -> l = leaf a :: nil
cover_in_inb_inb : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1
permutation_nil_inv : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), permutation l nil -> l = nil
code = fun A : Type => list (A * list bool) : Type -> Type Arguments code _%type_scope
inb_compute_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (p : btree A), inb (leaf a) p -> exists l : list bool, In (a, l) (compute_code p)
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}

original: intros l H. apply one_cover_ex. auto.
